thread.title: Don't miss: Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party
thread.title_full: Don't miss: Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party

author: Dewayne Bevil
title: Don't miss: Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party
text:
Don't miss: Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party Video: Jack Skellington and Sally at Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party The 'Nightmare Before Christmas' characters are new to the Magic Kingdom Halloween event. The 'Nightmare Before Christmas' characters are new to the Magic Kingdom Halloween event. By Dewayne Bevil Orlando Sentinel contact the reporter Hocus Pocus joins Not-So-Scary lineup 
WHAT: Disney World jump-starts the Halloween season with the 2015 launch of Mickey's Not-So-Scary Party on Tuesday. The after-hours, extra-ticket event turns with the Boo to You parade, HalloWishes fireworks display, characters in Halloween garb and multiple treat-or-treat locations. New in the Not-So-Scary lineup is the "Hocus Pocus Villain Spelltacular" stage show featuring the Sanderson Sisters from the Disney film "Hocus Pocus." The show will include appearances by Dr. Facilier, Oogie Boogie, Maleficent and other Disney villains, along with dancers, projections and special effects. Caption Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party Richard Tribou, Orlando Sentinel Images from the 2013 Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party. Images from the 2013 Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party. (Richard Tribou, Orlando Sentinel) Caption Boo to You parade at Magic Kingdom Walt Disney Co. The Boo to You parade at Magic Kingdom is part of Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party. The Boo to You parade at Magic Kingdom is part of Mickey's Not-So-Scary Halloween Party. (Walt Disney Co.) See more galleries 
WHEN: 7 p.m.-midnight on Sept. 15, 18, 20, 22, 25 and 27; Oct. 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 9, 12, 13, 15, 16, 18, 20, 22, 23, 25, 27 and 29; and Nov. 1. (The Oct. 31 party is sold out.) 
WHERE: Magic Kingdom, off Interstate 4, southwest of Orlando 
COST: Between $68 and $79, depending on date (between $63 and $74 for ages 3-9). In general, the less expensive dates are in September. 
CALL: 407-824-4321
